body_html: There is no source release other than getting the source code from GitHub. So once we merge this it's available for people to use. However if someone specifically asks to build the 1.3 branch, they will get the source code which builds the 1.3 binary, which would not include this change.
body_text:
There is no source release other than getting the source code from GitHub.
So once we merge this it's available for people to use.

However if someone specifically asks to build the 1.3 branch, they will get
the source code which builds the 1.3 binary, which would not include this
change.
body:
There is no source release other than getting the source code from GitHub.
So once we merge this it's available for people to use.

However if someone specifically asks to build the 1.3 branch, they will get
the source code which builds the 1.3 binary, which would not include this
change.
